author: Associated Press
title: 26 COVID-19 Cases Confirmed On Gulf of Mexico Offshore Oil Platforms
description: The new coronavirus that causes COVID-19 has been confirmed in more than two dozen people working on oil platforms in the Gulf of Mexico.
content:
(NEW ORLEANS) — The new coronavirus that causes COVID-19 has been confirmed in more than two dozen people working on oil platforms in the Gulf of Mexico, the Coast Guard said.
While an offshore rig might seem like an unlikely place for the virus to show up, … [+1064 chars]
